Like-Like was struck with one of the missiles, charring his organic skin.=
 He transforms and fires away at the shields, 23 rapid shots, but then he s=

       Tarantulas was=
 picking up the Destron communication, although it was 
  filled with stati=
c and noise. He worked on it a little until Hell Beast 
  approached. "Its =
a classic Destron trick Tarantulas. They want to get into 
  the base by bl=
owing open the shields. Counter that attack with these." 
        In his la=
rge aged hands laid a smooth black plate about a foot in 
  circumfrence. T=
he device, with the bright Predacon/Decepticon insignia of the 
  Neo Decep=
ticon Empire on it, was built to release a mini force feild in a 
  distanc=
e of 10 feet. These plates, when laid around the shield perimiter, 
  would=
 almost double the strength of the shields and undoubtedly stop the   
  De=
stron operation currently in progress. With the Autoguns, Missle turrets, 
=
  the EMP canon, four manule defense canons, and a hull so thick that a 
  =
titanium missle couldnt blow through it, Hell Beast was strategically sound=
. 
        Tarantulas picked up the device, and with Black Aracnia, Klash, =
and 
  Quickstrike they went to a cargo hold. There they found the plates a=
nd began 
  to spread them over the shield perimiter. 
        Hell Beast d=
rew his chain gun and loaded it. After replacing it he did 
  it to several=
 other weapons in the weapons locker. The assortment of fire 
  arms the Ra=
mora contained was absolutely devilish. At the bridge he watched 
  his tro=
ops, confident in thier actions. 

        Craken and Bezerker, carrying th=
e damaged and almost dead Nighteyes 
  quckly returned to the Ramora quickl=
y. The mech fluid from the bots peeled 
  off of them. Craken, carrying the=
 other two, entered the Ramora via a top 
  most zone of the shield dropped=
 and quickly activated agian.
